The mass media, including television, radio and newspapers, have great influence in shaping people's ideas. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement? Give reasons for your answer.

 

       Media plays a very important role in our day to day life.it is the strongest way of direct communication to the general public.nowadays each and every household has television at their homes,and by this people come across to know many things like what is happenning in and around us in the way of different news channels.these news channels provide us lot of information about what is happenning not only in india,but also all around the world.And in this way we come across many things that we dont know about our neighbouring states or other countries.And people can put their ideas, thoughts, and present their views by proper channel like online voting system,discussions and also by texting and messaging through thier mobiles on the particular given numbers directly.

      The other very important part of media channel is 'THE NEWSPAPERS'.In today's generation their is no household who does not read newspapers.Newspapers are the direct source of communication to the general public because it covers each and every topic.it gives each and every detail information about politics,sports,events,cinema's and many more daily.it also covers information about other countries.so by reading newspapers daily we come across many things and also we can express our views on a certain problems which has not been rectified.we can also complain to the certain authorities directly so that he can take action by publising our grievances in the newspaper.

     Radio also plays an important role and it is the fastest mode of communication to the general public.though it is the oldest form of communication but still it hasn't lost  its shine.radio can be used anywhere,it gives entertainment as well as lot of updates about the city as what is happening and nowadays we are getting lot of updates abouts traffic jams in the city so by this we can change our routes quickly to avoid and getting struck in the traffic.Also radio gives us lot of entertainment and important news updates from time to time.it plays our favourite songs it makes us laugh with thier comedies and they make us smile when our day to day life is becoming very stressful so by this we forget our tensions and smile.so radio plays a very important role in our daily life.

    Conclusion:Media channels should be used in the proper way so that people can know,learn and express their views,thoughts through proper channel.Media is very strongest part of communication.And through media people can reflect their ideas and build a strong governance in our country.And media should be people friendly so that people can come forward and express thier grievances without any fear,Because media  reflects peoples ideas and it passes information to the concern persons very quickly.So media is such a powerful medium that it can make or even break the government.
